channel.title: Help with autosave and monster location - Im a newb, probably real easy
channel.description:
Is there anyway I can have someone host my server with my source files on MY computer?
EDIT: One last request. How do I change when the game autosaves?
Like how many mins between each save. What file and what line?
EDIT 2: OOPS! Another Request! How do I move the Jad to the Mage Arena? And how do I add Chaos Elementals there?
[s]EDIT 3: AAANNNDDD, I want an emote tab which teles to x, x (Haven't figured out coords yet). How do I do this!?[/s] - Thanks A.E.M!

item.title: Help with autosave and monster location - Im a newb, probably real easy
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

What file are they in?

Hurry.

I need to put my server on

Read full topic

item.title: Help with autosave and monster location - Im a newb, probably real easy
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

get the coords you want to move jad and coas to and use this

spawn = jad ID Xcoord Ycoord 0 0 0 0 0 0 JAD
spawn = Choas ID Xcoord Ycoord 0 0 0 0 0 0 Choas

Read full topic
